name: BzzzZ
description:
Funny puzzle-action game. Your goal is to catch mosquito with the same colored frog. Otherwise frog will change it's color. For the right mosquito you will get a golden tooth. These teeth will be your ticket to the next level. Sounds simple? Try it! But dont forget it's puzzle.

- Action Mixed With Puzzle
- Funny Characters
- Funny Moments
- 90 Easy And Hard Levels
- Retina Graphics

More Games: www.git-apps.com
